scripts.build:macos-arm64: pnpm bundle && pnpm exec pkg dist/index.cjs -t node20-macos-arm64 -o ../../../src-tauri/binaries/rainy-agents-server-aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:macos-x64: pnpm bundle && pnpm exec pkg dist/index.cjs -t node20-macos-x64 -o ../../../src-tauri/binaries/rainy-agents-server-x86_64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:linux-x64: pnpm bundle && pnpm exec pkg dist/index.cjs -t node20-linux-x64 -o ../../../src-tauri/binaries/rainy-agents-server-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build:windows-x64: pnpm bundle && pnpm exec pkg dist/index.cjs -t node20-win-x64 -o ../../../src-tauri/binaries/rainy-agents-server-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.exe
